thoughts.text: I think it would be helpful to start by listing the files in the current directory to get a sense of what resources are available.
thoughts.reasoning: Listing the files in the directory will give me an idea of what resources are available and what actions I can take next.
thoughts.plan:
- Use the 'list_files' command to list the files in the current directory
- Review the list of files to determine what actions to take next
thoughts.criticism: I should be careful not to make assumptions based solely on the file names and should review the contents of each file before taking any action.
thoughts.speak: I will use the 'list_files' command to list the files in the current directory.
